original_text: Christian friends, I came to tell you God's true message. I did not use clever words when I spoke to you. I did not try to make you think that I was very wise. Corinthians 1 Corinthians 3
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 너희에게 나아가 하나님의 증거를 전할 때에 말과 지혜의 아름다운 것으로 아니하였나니

sentences.original_text: Christian friends, I came to tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도인 친구들, 내가 너희에게 말하러 왔노라

sentences.original_text: I did not use clever words
I did not try to make you think
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 생각하게 하려고 애쓰지 않았다
